H0.text: Which sidekick rode a horse called Scout . Little Beaver

H1.text: Which sidekick rode a horse called Scout . Cimarron

H2.text: Which sidekick rode a horse called Scout . Gabby Hayes

H3.text: Which sidekick rode a horse called Scout . TONTO

A4.text: The horse is finally named Scout in 'Border Dope Smuggling' (September 2, 1938).

A5.text: Tonto frequently says, 'Git-um up, Scout!' in the Lone Ranger mythos.
